function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data privacy and security in the collection and analysis of sensitive and personal data through IoT and Big Data technologies","Impact":"Jeopardizes the privacy and rights of urban dwellers, leading to potential misuse of personal information","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption, access controls, and privacy policies. Educate urban dwellers about data privacy and provide transparency about data collection and usage.","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems, privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"Urban dwellers, city residents","Owner":"City authorities, technology companies, data governance organizations"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interconnected smart systems and devices","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission due to the interconnected nature of smart city components","Mitigation":"Implement health monitoring systems, real-time disease tracking, and data analysis to identify and mitigate disease hotspots. Promote public health awareness and hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, real-time data analytics, disease tracking systems","People":"City residents, visitors, public health organizations","Owner":"City authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of standards for secure IoT device integration and data exchange","Impact":"Vulnerability to cyber attacks and data breaches through insecure IoT devices and data exchange protocols","Mitigation":"Establish and enforce IoT device security standards, secure data exchange protocols, and regular security audits of IoT infrastructure. Collaborate with technology companies to develop secure IoT solutions.","Technologies":"IoT security standards, secure data exchange protocols, security auditing tools","People":"City authorities, technology companies, cybersecurity experts","Owner":"City authorities, technology companies"}]}
